name: nerio93/facturae-php
description: Librería para la generación, firma y envío de facturas electrónicas

suggest.ext-openssl: For signing and timestamping both invoices and SOAP requests
suggest.ext-curl: For communicating with remote TSA Servers and SOAP Web Services
